item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
This could be a welcome back for some of you or the first hello from me with this blog. I initially started this back in 2019 when I started my first apprenticeship but I had a lot to deal with which I’ve now been able to get more of a handle on and I’m now jumping back onto the wagon.

What’s the point?

This blog will contain primarily my thoughts and a point of view from a fairly new member of the STEM/InfoSec/CyberSecurity industry and hopefully provide you with a new angle to the field. If you have any questions please feel free to contact me at contact@taylorwatson.co.uk or just drop me a message on my LinkedIn.

I hope that I’ll be able to keep this consistent but please bear in mind that I’m juggling a full-time degree, working and progressing in a SOC (Security Operations Center), and then also trying to balance my life as a (current) teenager.

Please also note that the format of this site may change as time goes on and that’s because I’m still trying to find out what works and what doesn’t.

Other than that. Thank you for reading, I hope you find this interesting, and I hope that you’ll be able to stick around for the journey which is my career.

T.
